reviews_data.review_text: My cat-loving kindergartener and I spent a wonderful morning here -- at 10am on Saturdays kids younger than 7 can visit with the cats. There were so many sweet cats -- it was hard to leave empty handed!!

Comfortable vibes and good atmosphere. The cats all have such different personalities but are all wholesome interactions. it's so fun that the employees know them so well too. I think they have the whole place set up really well, 10/10 interior designing
I think grumpy cat (light and dark brown) actually liked me!

The only complaint I have about this place is that I'll never be able to experience it for the first time ever again! The coffee selection is wonderful and all very delicious, the staff at this location were incredibly hospitable and kind, and playing in the cat room was an hour well spent.

I enthusiastically recommend this place to anybody looking for a fun way to hang out with friends, to anybody seeking good coffee in the Charlotte area, or for anybody in need of an inexpensive mood-boost. I really cannot commend enough the hospitality of the staff here.

Everything about my time spent here was perfect.
Just a super cute place. :))
Good coffee, a guitar, and cats. Good place to purr.

A MUST visit if you loveeee cats   Coffee, latte, smoothies, beer/wine  The kitties are all adoptable, yall! Come experience this place. The ambience is so inviting and extremely clean. Outdoor patio with string lights and patio heater /fans. You know you want a great drink and pet the sweetest funniest cats.  Solid 10/10

Even if you are not a cat lover, this is a fun place. Nice atmosphere, great coffee and espresso selections. They have an area you can "rent time" with cats. Since I am not a cat person it was nice to be in a separate area.

This is my favorite coffee house downtown. I enjoy grabbing a cup of coffee to make my pastry company. I like the vibe and decor. Everyone has always been friendly to me. I have also been there during one of their live events. That was fun. I appreciate the outdoor seating, which I have also experienced. I'm not so much a cat person, but I respect what they are able to provide to folks who come in to spend time with the cats. And I love all the adoptions that have taken place because of them. The one constructive criticism that I will share is to lower the music a bit. That will make the space feel that much better. Love the MAC Tabby Cat Cafe

This (Saturday, Dec 28, 2024) was our 2nd or 3rd visit to the Concord location (we have also visited Noda and want to visit Salisbury when we get the chance). We love them both, we always have a great time, the staff is always friendly and willing to answer all the questions we have, and they are very knowlegdeable when doing so. And of course, every cat is special.

Phenomenal place! The staff were friendly, the place itself was inviting, and the cats were adorable. It's 10$ for half an hour and 14$ for an hour in the cat lounge, and the coffees are about 4.50$ on average. I tried a coffee and a cream soda and both were delicious. Drinks were allowed into the cat lounge. They had seasonal flavors for coffee, and the cafe was decorated very nicely for the holiday season. The cat room itself was spacious, with a variety of cat toys to use. There was a TV in the corner of the room that played a slideshow with images and names of the cats, and all of the cats are listed online as well. Overall it was an amazing experience and I'll be sure to visit again when I'm in town.

I was driving on Cabarrus Avenue when I saw the sign directing me to the Mac Tabby Cat Cafe.  I heard about it and decided to visit and just happened to have my boy cat Storm with me.  He behaved in his carrier while I was in the cattery in all my feline glory!  The other patrons got to meet Storm, as well.  It is comforting to know that these babies are being cared for and prepared for their new and  loving forever home.  Today, I will be dropping off cleaning supplies.  I know I will see my other babies again....in Heaven.  I often bargain with God: "Let cats into Heaven and I'll clean all the litterboxes!

Had the most amazing time here today! The staff were very friendly and patient, coffee was done quick and it was really delicious. I would come here for just the drinks. Hanging with the kitties was also amazing. They were all so chill and it's really fun to watch them all interact with each other/do their own things. There's something therapeutic about being in such a cozy environment with so many kitties. Will definitely be coming back, absolutely worth the 40 minute drive :)

My favorite cat cafe ever! The drinks are amazing, the staff is very kind and the cats are so sweet and healthy. I am about forty minutes away but try to go once every month because of how worth it the experience is
The vibe is so chill. Great coffee, good beers to choose from...there's always good music playing and the ambience is very relaxing. Don't even get me started on the cat room

I went to Mac Tabby on a Sunday shortly after they opened and would highly recommend it! The cafe is cute and houses an extensive menu, making this a great spot to come for a great cup of coffee, not just the cats! As a lounge, the cats were a mix of active and sleepy, which was fine by me. All were kind and receptive to petting.

Unfortunately, the group in the cat lounge with us consisted of two children who were rowdy, and they made the experience less than enjoyable. My boyfriend and I were looking forward to spending some time with kitties, and instead we spent 30 minutes with kids who were jumping around (one of which consistently jumped in front of the cats) and dangling the toys in an attempt to make the kittens "do a backflip", which was stressful. In the future, it would be nice to see them have a supervised, children-only room, or different hours reserved just for adults. Despite that, I still rate my visit a 5/5, because this is not the cafe's doing, but the children! Your experience could be entirely different.

Again, I don't hold this against the cafe at all, nor do I the workers, as they were all extremely friendly, but if you're looking to avoid children and relax during your visit, consider coming during the week. I will be back, but likely during a weekday where I'm less likely to share the lounge with kids who are throwing toys onto the air vent to get a cat to jump down.

such a sweet place! went on a thursday afternoon and it was a super chill place to relax. the workers were friendly, booking a reservation was easy, the chai latte was amazing(!), and the cats were adorable. looking forward to coming back here!

This place is so amazing! Friendly staff, playful cats, a wide selection of coffee sticks, beer, wine and specialty sodas.  We reserved the room for a small birthday celebration, and everyone had the best time! The cats are all clearly happy, healthy, and well-socialized. Cat toys entrance are provided, and there are countless spots to sit and snuggle. We can't wait to go back!

I hate to rate it this way but when really wanting to adopt this cat after being there twice, we get no update, I call mac tabby and they tell me princetonsmeow handles it so I email them, nothing. I've been calling for days, nothing. I don't mean harm to mactabby because the service and people there are wonderful but this adoption process has been such a let down. Seeing cats get adopted that were there AFTER you put in an application weeks ago is frustrating. We've adopted cats before from DailyMews with no problems so I don't understand what's different this time.

MY POINT IS: be weary and don't have your hopes us like us because you might be ignored if you want to adopt in the end.

All the staff members here are super helpful and kind  Fun to bring your friends or just chill out by yourself. A great fixture in the Concord community! I find that this one is much easier to park and walk to than the one in Noda.

Be sure to sign your waivers and arrive on time for your slot, to maximize your time! And remember, the number one rule is not to grab or pick up the cats... Let them choose you!

Mac Tabby Cat Cafe in Concord is a fantastic spot for cat lovers! The cozy atmosphere is perfect for relaxing with friendly, adoptable cats while enjoying a great cup of coffee. The staff is welcoming, and the cats are playful and well-cared for, making the experience both fun and heartwarming. Whether you're looking to adopt or just spend some time with adorable feline friends, this cafe is a must-visit!

This cozy spot offers a delightful combination of great coffee, and adorable cats. With high praise for its ambiance and friendly service, visitors enjoy interacting with the cats while savoring items like their drinks.

Make sure you do reservations before you visit to avoid waiting.
Always a great experience coming here!
I love cats and it was relatively cheap they even did a custom drink for me.
An incredible place to just completely unwind. Lovely staff, lovely coffee, lovely cats.
Loveliest cats ever. Overhill is a cutie
Such a lovely place! The cats are so happy and loved, and the coffee was great! Definitely will be back
I don't have any pictures because my phone was dead, but the drinks were great!! I loved petting thr cats. They were super friendly and snuggled right up to me. 100% coming back here someday.
Fantastic cat cafe. It was clean, beautiful, and fun!!

I went with my daughter and we had a great time! The location was beautifully decorated with lots of very cute cat themed things. The coffee was fantastic and they had lots of choices! If you're not into coffee or craving something else they have multiple other beverage choices available, as well as some delicious looking pastries. The employees were all very friendly and informative and made the whole experience a great one! The cats themselves are all very adorable and friendly. We had the best time getting to hang out with the kitties and we will definitely be back!

5 stars across the broad this was my first time here and i had really high expectations and this place succeeded all of them. Great drinks, Great Service AMAZING KITTYS. If you like cats you should definitely come here. It is worth every penny

I'm so impressed with this Cat Cafe; I am have traveled the country to visit different cat cafes, and I have also worked at one. This is the best cat cafe I've ever visited!! This is my second time coming here and I'm consistently impressed.

The coffee is amazing and has so many fun flavors and seasonal options. I got the huckleberry latte and it was so yummy!

The cat lounge is very cute and has lots of art and decor that's perfect for a photo op. It's very very clean in there and doesn't smell like cat whatsoever. Most cat cafes I've been to have at least a little cat smell, but not here. I also like that they have plastic furniture with comfy removable cushions and blankets-- easy to remove and sanitize so you know this place is clean.

The environment is also very cozy and chill; dimly lit with colorful Christmas lights and rustic decor. It's a space I would hang out in regardless of the cats.

The cats themselves are very friendly and cuddly! They have 12 adoptable cats from the humane society and they are all very well taken care of and seem very happy. I would recommend coming here to support their amazing cause-- getting cats off the streets and out of scary noisy shelters fosters a space for the cats to be happy, calm, social, and really show their personality. If you're looking to adopt a cat, absolutely get one from here!

Can't wait to visit again in the future! Thank you from Salt Lake City, Utah!!

First off the location is in perfect little spot. The inside is brick and low lighting, very atmospheric! There were two staff members and. Both ladies were very helpful in answering our questions. We spent 30 bucks (3 people) for 30 minutes in "The Cat Room." The room is a cozy little room with I believe was 16 cats. All were very friendly. We will be back again!

I like the atmosphere and their food was good even tho I only got a drink the only thing that made me mad was you had to pay to see the cats $8 for only 30 minutes if I pay to see the cat's I want to be able to stay for as long as I please. The lady who was working today was very nice tho.
Love coffee? Love cats? Need to unwind? Want to adopt a sweet rescue kitty? This is the place! Been here twice so far... I'll be back.
I like cats

This was an amazing way to start our Sunday! The room for the cats is set up so nice for the cats well-being and for several guests to play with them comfortably. The host was so friendly and knowledgeable. She answered our questions about the kitties and was very kind and loving towards the kitties. We had a lovely time! Definitely worth the visit!
Visited this place on a rainy day, and it was very peaceful time. Most kitties very sweet and playful, some sleepy, some prefer to stay away. Overall you won't regret if you visit :)

I came here with my friends and had such a great time! These kitties were so sweet and so many of them wanted to play and some sweet ones were just sleeping through all the ruckus of the others playing. Some of us got drinks and they were both very delicious. They had a good few milk alternatives if needed and everyone working was so kind and sweet. Overall, we all had a great time i'm surprised none of us went home with a new kitty

I love this place. Been a customer of this location since day one and it never gets old. The staff are super friendly and they are always willing to give you more information about each cat if you're interested. The coffee is excellent and there are plenty of room to sit down and enjoy it.
If you love cats and like to be around many of them while enjoying a cup of coffee, this is the place to be.
the cats are SOOOOO adorable, the coffee and non-coffee drinks are fantastic too!

We took our 7 year old here at his request as a reward for doing well in school and it was our first visit. We got a cotton candy lemonade, a cold brew, and a raspberry white mocha and all three beverages were delicious! On top of that we got to spend an hour with 12 adorable kitty cats and fell in love with Lucy, Theodore, and Circe. It was hard to leave and the hour went by too quickly! The cats are well loved and cared for and we are already in discussions as to whether or not we should adopt one or two kitties now! We will definitely be back. Drop in and get some kitty loving and a yummy drink too to support a great cause.
The best!

this place is the best place you could visit in concord nc. the cats are so loving and the EMPLOYEES!! the customer service at all locations is just SPOT-ON perfection. i have grown a connection to a lot of the employees and this place will be in my heart forever! if you're in concord nc this is a MUST visit place! It's so affordable also, and the coffees and desserts are always fresh and delicious! i love this place so so much 100000000/10

Not what I was expecting. It's just for folks to come visit their cats (up for adoption)
I thought it was someplace I could bring my cat. Possibly to interact with other cats.
KITEEEE
Great place for a first date or just for a couple close friends to chat.
This place is so neat!  The atmosphere is charming, the staff is friendly, and there are cats to play with!  Highly recommend.

Best coffee shop I have ever been to and the cat lounge area makes it even better. All of the baristas are friendly, courteous and do their absolute best to ensure you are satisfied with your drinks, pastry items and lounge experience. The only criticism I can come up with is I wish the volume of the music was lower but that is strictly a personal preference.
Cute idea.  If you enjoy cats, please stop by.  The cats are adoptable, vetted and provided by Princeton's Meow, and in an enclosed space.  Drinks and some snacks are available for purchase.
Great coffee, great atmosphere!! The cats are precious and playful!! Only 8 dollars for 30 minutes of cat playtime!! Had a great first experience and will return!!
We loved the cats and food at that place the cats were so cute

Great atmosphere, friendly staff and great drinks! I took my daughter for her birthday and she was able to hang out with the cats. The women who worked there took the time to introduce us to the cats and made us comfortable. Will definitely visit again.
Good way to spend an hour.

We love having such a perfect coffee place next to us. The coffee is great, the service is great, and the cats are an added bonus. The room of cats is an additional cost, but goes to helping cats. The baked goods are also yummy, and you're lucky if they have them in stock, they sell out!

Great little space. Every detail has been thought out. It's clean, decorated well, fun, quirky and the cat-ristas are funny and personable. You should make an appointment for a cat slot, there's a limit to how many guests can come in the cat room at a time. The cats are adoptable and there's several toys out for interaction but we were advised not to pick up or hold the cats but petting is okay. We paid $8.00 per person for 30 mins.

It was a little hard to park because there's no parking next to the building, that's another business. Just park 1/2 block away at the 2 hr public parking spaces. The front door was a little hard to find on the left hand side. We came for the cats but there are several seating areas and tables for eating all decorated and with their own flare. Even the bathroom was nice.

Awesome place - one of a kind experience in Concord. Recommended highly.

They have craft smoothies and local drinks while you play with cats. What's not to love?
Everyone was so nice, the place was super clean, the coffee was phenomenal, and the cats are so sweet! Great environment and great experience
A great place if you love cat! It's super cheap and extremely fun! You can also adopt a cat there tooo!

I am soon to be adopting two sweet sisters to join our family! I have adopted from Princeton's Meow before and came to Mac Tabby because the kitties come from Princeton's. I didn't order anything to eat or drink. I just came to see the sweet kitties.

This is a beautiful location with so much ambiance! At the time, I focused on the kitties, but thinking back, it was so calming and stylish.  There are so many places to sit for both humans and felines. It really is a beautiful location and staffed by very friendly people. I especially liked that there were toys to play with the kitties and places for them to relax away from attention if they desired.

I went through the application process, and I am very happy to learn that I am approved! I can't wait to bring our girls home! When they come home, they will be Cake and Edith!  Do you get the pun?

I love it here! Mac Tabby Cat Cafe has very comfortable seating, a very on-brand atmosphere, and a wide variety of menu items to choose from. Plus, free Wi-Fi! It's a fantastic place to study and get online work done. I only wish that they served some healthier food options along with their desserts, candies, and chips. Otherwise, absolutely fantastic.

Went here last year with a friend and had a wonderful experience. We both ordered lattes while we waited to play with the kitties and the coffee was really tasty. The cats are all really sweet and loved all the attention. I think it is really great how you can learn info about the cats while you're there and even adopt one of them if you'd like. Amazing spot!

This place is soooo cool!! If you like cats it is a must, the deco is amazing and very nice menu for coffee deinks and beverages. You get to go and play with cats for a small fee. Plus outdoor place available as well. A place to chill, work, get entertaining with the lovely cats or just pick coffee.
I loved my experience at Mac Tabby Cafe. My fiance took me for a anniversary date. The staff are nice and the cats are adorable.
What an amazing experience! Drinks tasted great and all the kitty's are healthy, social and affectionate I honestly can't believe how fast are hour went but this is are new favorite spot!

In a world torn and tattered, sometimes you just need to retreat and restore your soul. Come spend an hour at MacTabby's with these amazing fur babies with big personalities, from playful to shy.  You won't regret it.
I love what they stand for, the drinks are awesome, but hanging in the cat room is the absolute best!!!
This is a great spot to come and have a drink while you pet cats. Everything is affordable and the animals are always so sweet and socialized

I've been waiting to visit this place and finally did! It was all I expected and some! I absolutely loved every detail from the car earrings, the art and the most awesome kitties to pet and enjoy my coffee with. I had a coffee and it was creative and delicious. I could hang out here all day and swear I'd work here for free haha. Perfect happy place and I can't wait to visit again! A Concord Gem!

Very calming environment, such a vibe! They have so many unique choices for coffee, i got the iced pumpkin white chocolate mocha and it was so good. They don't hover over you when with the cats, i got the lasy tome slot of the day so i had the cats all to myself

Coffee options are good with a wide variety of crafted choices.

Food isn't usually available unless there for an event.  Then they usually have a food truck available.
My favorite place to be! Drinks are good, pastries are to die for (get any flavor bombwhich and thank me later) and kitties are always adorable.
Love the kitties!!
Loved the Christmas in July theme. We donated supplies for the kitties and got 20 per cent off our coffee bill.
I love the cats! Service was excellent! And the Iced Espresso Spritzer was absolutely amazingly delicious!
Friendly staff, good coffee, and happy cats.

Great place to meet up for coffee, beer, or wine!! The cats are in a secluded room, so no worries if you are more sensitive to cats. Amazing how quickly relationships can spring up under a shared love for animals. Keep up with their socials because they will frequently have live music and food trucks!!
Really enjoy the cats and the staff was super friendly.
Very friendly and welcoming staff. My daughter has severe social anxiety, but she feels relaxed while she is there due to the great atmosphere.  That says a lot!

Had a great time at the cafe.   The coffee was delicious .    Cats are nocturnal creatures so some of them seemed a little lazy and really shy.   But they were all chill and didn't really care that we were in their space.
My first visit to a cat cafe. Wanted to adopt all of the cats! Had my first Lavendar coffee. Sooo good!

This place is amazing! Fantastic coffee bar and cats to play with! The best combo. The cats here are all extremely friendly and playful. My GF and I really wanted to adopt one of them! Also, the staff here is amazing, they tell you about the cats and answer any questions you may have.
Loved the cats. Tea was good too.

Amazing! We go about once a week ( get the membership it's worth it!)
Pros-
-The staff are so nice & helpful, the drinks are delicious, (only thing we haven't had are the smoothies bc they seem pretty expensive) the snacks and merch are nicely priced and great quality.
- they keep everything updated on their FB page weekly which is great!
-cats are so cute and most of the staff know all of them and their stories etc and they come check on you every 20 mins or so and play with everyone and it's just overall a fun time! They are all well kept up and have a super nice clean area to play
Cons-
In all fairness I really should be rating a 4 but most of these things are out of their control or just me being picky....
- parking rn is crazy, you can't pull down the actual st most of the time because of construction and when you can spots are taken. There is a small lot across/behind the building (less than a 5 min walk) but that's usually full so there is a parking garage right to the left of the building (when you walk outside the cafe look left) that's the best space we've found so far.
- I wish they had better seating inside the cat room. Most are so high, too low, oddly shaped, too small/big. Like I I just wanna sit down in a soft comfy chair or maybe a beanbag type, sofa , etc and relax with the cats. I end up finding myself in the ground or standing bc the chairs are hard, too small or just oddly shaped.

- overall just amazing! Keep up the awesome work and thank you for all you do :)
Fun place, great drinks and sweets!!
Wonderful experience for adults and kids alike. The cats were endlessly entertaining! Fill out the application and take one, or two, home!!
What a great place!!
Love this place! I Love to come and spend time with the cats and the coffee is delicious! I have also adopted from them and it was a great experience! I love what they do here!

The atmosphere was so cute and the employees were very welcoming and helpful with any questions. The menu is huge and didn't disappoint, of course the cats were adorable and friendly too! Will be back!

My husband and I had the best time here! Everything was perfectly clean and the employees were very friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable. We live an hour away and would definitely return and spread the word. Definitely recommend. Your only regret will be that you didn't book two hours! Thank you for a great night!

Most interesting place I've been in a while. Impeccable service, loads of seating, not loud, and delicious coffee! I enjoyed the blackberry lavender white mocha...new all time favorite coffee ever. They offer tea, alcohol, hot cocoa, lemonade, smoothies, and kombucha, too.
Love it here. Everyone is so friendly and the atmosphere is amazing. Delicious coffee & sweet kitties.

We LOVED our experience. Sweet staff, delicious drinks and of course KITTIES! I like to go on weekdays best. The less people the better when it comes to this place. Gives you a chance to relax with the cats and enjoy your drink. Highly recommend.  If you think you're looking to adopt, put in an application early. It takes 3 days to get approved, so it pays to do it before you fall in love with the cat and then they have been adopted. Just a hint!
nice atmosphere and very helpful staff

A unique cafe tuck inside downtown Concord. This place has a lot of variety of coffee along with great selection of local beer. They also have a cat lounge that allows your cat make friends. Mac Tabby is also a cat adoption Cafe for anyone who wants to adopt a kitten or cat. A must visit if your in downtown Concord. Great customer service with terrific atmosphere!!!

This was my first visit to Mac Tabby Cat Cafe-Concord!  I met with friends for a book club and loved the cozy cat cafe!  The cat area is separate from the rest of the establishment and there are a variety of cats that are available for adoption.  It's located in the heart of downtown Concord and has a great front porch area, as well as indoor seating.  They have a variety of beverages and the person who helped us was super friendly and helpful!

This was my first time at a cat cafe. In all reality, I didn't know what to expect. The atmosphere and drink offerings were great. The staff was friendly.
There are two negatives that shouldn't affect the rating but patrons should be aware:
1) the cats weren't as friendly as I had imagined (this is probably due to the fact that most are rescues). They're not mean, and some of the younger ones will play, but none were the kind that would walk up, rub against your leg, or even purr.  They did allow you to pet them, but most were napping when I went.
2) The price/hour felt a bit high. If during the week, it's only $50 to get the whole room for an hour for you and up to 9 others, it should be closer to $5/person for an hour instead of $12. IOW, if you and 3 others are going during the week, just pay the extra two dollars to get the whole room to yourselves.
3) There are only 2 parking spots by the cafe currently. So, plan on a slight walk.
Coffee and cats, what could be better? We were there when one lucky kitty went home with a new family

Cat puns incoming... This place is purrrrfect for all you feline lovers, or even folks just coming by to get a coffee, protein smoothie, hot chocolate, or flavored lemonade! In fact, I'd prefer you just come for the ambiance so there are more kitties per cat-pita for me.  I'm kidding... mostly! The staff is super friendly and knowledgeable about each cat resident awaiting their furrever homes. It's a great experience for a little feline-citous visit, or to tease out more about each cat's purrsonality before deciding to adopt.

The online reservation system is super easy to use. And if you can only come once, aim for the weekend as adoptions & new arrivals occur on Wednesdays, and it often takes new cats a few days to feel comfurrable enough to explore and play. But with 12 cats in attendance, there's always someone up for a feather toy, laser pointer, or head scritches!
Super friendly staff! Food and drinks were great! All the cats were super friendly and the service was quick! awesome experience, I'd definitely visit again.

Always wonderful to spend time with the cats at MacTabby.  I love the Concord location.  It's a beautiful space with lots of room to play with the cats.  All of the cats seem happy and healthy, not like a pet store.

Mac Tabby excels as both a coffee shop and adoption facility. The espresso they serve is exceptional and compliments the creative seasonal drinks they offer. The cat experience is optional, but well worth it; the room is impressively dander-free and the cats seem to feel comfortable. I find this to be a much preferred environment to interact with the cats than a majority of adoption centers. I would recommend Mac Tabby for anyone looking for good coffee or to adopt a cat, and certainly anyone looking for both!
Best coffee in downtown concord!

Loved this place! Reserved an hour with a few friends and had a blast. Their drinks and cookies are excellent, and the workers are very nice. The cats are always fun to play with, and atmosphere is the best part! Paintings and books of cats surround you when you enter, and the whole place is very calming. Overall, this place is a 10/10 and I'll be sure to visit again!
Cute cats! Good drinks also!
Great place to get coffee and pet the kitties! They also have cute gifts for those who love cats! Oh and the coffee is great too!!

My friend and I visited yesterday and we absolutely loved it we had a visit with the cats who were so sweet. The drinks were good and the staff was so friendly and welcoming. I went back again today I love it so much. It's very relaxing and a cute place.
Amazing spot with great staff and very cute cats. The cats were surprisingly friendly and I found no hair on me after I left.
Always love this place, they take such good care of the babies. And we even found a kitty we wanted to put in an application for. So here's to hoping we hear back! (:
I love Mac tabby cat cafe the cats are so nice and playful and cut if you haven't gone go now it's Amazing (not the Actual photos of the cats)
Lovely people and healthy, content, sweet cats. I wish I ould adopt them all. The coffee drinks are excellent too! Highly recommend.

I loved going here! Very family friendly. Went for my child's birthday who is autistic. They had a blast. It was very enjoyable and relaxing. They made a good coffee drink and my cupcake was fantastic. Plan on going back.

AHH I love this place! I wish I could go to it everyday! I live more than an hour out of town but it was worth it. I recommend to make a reservation before you go because this place is popular. It's impossible to be in a bad mood here! What will happen is when you get in you will talk to the lady at the front desk and sign in . The. You'll wait until they call you in. When you get in you can just play with the cats. You can't pick them up but you can pet them and they can sit in your lap. I really recommend getting a drink because they are really good and so are the cake pops! Overall this place is a 5/5 for me and I will be coming her again very soon.

I love Mac Tabby!  They have the best coffee in downtown Concord and the atmosphere is obviously fantastic! I do interviews for my business here we've had our company Christmas party here as well. Can't say enough good things about Mac Tabby and the people working there!
I love this location. Awesome food and cats. Highly recommend the visit.
Cute cats, Friendly staff, lovely experience.
Our family loves Mac Tabby Cafe.
Cool atmosphere, great staff, nice place to relax and enjoy play time with some sweet kitties. Had a wonderful time here.
Good tasting coffee, awesome experience. Will go again.

It's always a great addition to the day when I go to Mac Tabby Cat Cafe.

I've been a few times with different family/friends and every time we go the staff is always welcoming and patient when we order. They have ground coffee that is to DIE FOR. It beats any big brand coffee chain any day. Hands down. The one we got had nodes of blueberry in it and it's now the only ground coffee we want to buy.

Also every time I go it's always clean. There's never trash left on the cafe tables or odors of kitty litter. The cats are well taken care of and is always a pleasant experience!! Thank you!
Such a nice place to meet sweet cats. Plan to visit when the cats are not sleepy!!
I like the space: I can meet someone or burrow into a cubby and work alone. Cat thing/mission is cool but I haven't tried it.

A lovely little cafe that was recommended to us by a friend who we were visiting who lives locally. If you like cats, then this is the perfect spot for 30 minutes of feline therapy and coffee. I loved this place (especially the iced latte) and my wife and daughter would have happily come home with the cats if they could have gotten away with it. A really nice cafe with a great team (and the humans who work there are pretty cool too!)
Was fun place to visit. Enjoyed drinking coffee and playing with  the cats.
Such a great place for coffee and kitties!

Nice little area with a lot of cats to play with. Came in the early afternoon to find that a lot of them were resting or not ready to play. This isn't on the cats, as they were probably tired of being messed with all day but I feel like they should give the cats more of a break in between sessions or something

What a beautiful spot! My husband and I are new to the area and came here for coffee and a nice place to read. It is perfect. The cats are very adorable and the atmosphere is lovely. It's very clean and the cats are in a separate room so even if you're allergic or they aren't your vibe you can enjoy the cafe nonetheless. Highly recommend!

What a fun and cozy place! Visited for the first time with my daughter today and it was great! The staff is super friendly, they have all kinds of drinks, and a relaxing cat room. The kitties were snoozing at first but quickly warmed up and started playing. Definitely a cool place to hang out.
Buen lugar pata los queen gustan los gatos y el cafe.

The cats are adorable, the people are super friendly, and the place is super cute. The cats are obviously very well cared for and happy, too. Oh, and the drinks are very good. I haven't tried any of the food yet, though.
Para los que aman los gatos ,como a mi hija,buen lugar espero volver muy pronto
Very good coffee, and all the cats were extremely sweet and sociable. I recommend making a reservation as they're very popular and busy.
Have a coffee & play with cats...yes please. Such a wonderful place. Every city needs one of these. Not only do you play with cats but you can adopt them.

Loved this place.  Staff super friendly.   Cats cute as could be.  Kennel area busy, so make an appointment if you really want to get to play with kitty cats.  Local Cabarrus beverages available.   We loved it!  Super clean. They do not serve food.
Very friendly staff and cats.  Wish my cats at home were as well behaved!  Glad to see these kitties find a home.

I really loved this cafe! It was my first time ever checking out a Cat Cafe and i was made to feel very welcomed by the baristas/personable staff! I really enjoyed the elaborate description of the cats at this cafe by the staff. Plus the delicious Matcha Latte I'm definitely looking forward to adopting a cat soon from Princeton's Meow!
Great food truck tonight.  The King of Pizza.  Sat on the porch, it was nice.
Such friendly and knowledgeable staff, great coffee, and you get to spend time with kitties that need some loving. What's not to love about this place?!

A sanctuary of serotonin boosters. AMAZING baristas, tasty locally made treats, and an inviting environment that draws you back for more. Like most people, there's not a place I enjoy more in this world than my own home. Mac Tabby almost beats home, I swear  If you're looking for a place to come hang out, come to Mac Tabby. If you like local craft beers, coffees, desserts, smoothies, etc, come to Mac Tabby. If you're best friend wants to adopt a cat, but isn't sure what kind of cat they want, RUN TO MAC TABBY. They have $40 a month memberships which is good for you and 1 other person to get in whenever you want for free (as long as there is room of course). Support your local businesses and save your local cats
Wonderful place and staff is exceptional!  Will be going back.

We came here for my daughter's birthday party and rented the room for an hour. We all loved it, kids and adults alike. The staff was incredibly friendly and made great lattes ;)
I love that all the cats are up for adoption and that they help find homes for them and help create more room in the shelters.

Okay so call me crazy, or maybe a mom that just knows how to spend as much time as I can with my teenage daughter. Don't just hit up 1 Mac Tabby Cafe, but 2 in the same day!!! Not only do you get too bond with the animals, but you get too bond with your child no matter the age. This Concord location is just as amazing as the Charlotte. The coffee, staff, and atmosphere. We'll definitely be back!

Had my first visit mid-day on Friday. The cat cafe is really cute, and staff were friendly. There were quite a few people in the cat room - there were 10 in the room (not including staff). Since the cafe has a max of 12 cats, some of which hang out in a separate space and others of which are sleeping, there wasn't much of an opportunity to spend time with the cats. It would be great to see some more comfortable and accessible seating.

Super friendly and helpful staff, adorable kitties, great drinks. The place was super clean. Hard to believe there were 12 cats in there. We had an absolute blast and will certainly return. Highly recommend.
Wonderful Atmosphere!!

Great people and great place. We spent time there petting cats and drinking coffee drinks. Others were there to give a cat their forever home. Great place to spend some time with cats or find a new companion.
Just came for a 6:30 time to see the cats on 03/10/2022 and it was really fun their hot chocolate was also really good you need to go there only $12 for 1 hour really good price
What a Wonderful Place!!! My Daughter and myself had a Fantastic time
Never been to a place like this.  Different. They have actual cats separated from the Cafe. Is really cool. Coffee is real good and prices not too bad
OMG cats! Staff was pawesome too. We'll be back.

SUCH a cute little cafe in an adorable part of town. Loved how sunny and cozy the cat room was. Ordered a DELICIOUS butterbeer coffee at the suggestion of the super sweet Shannon! Had some wonderful conversations with her about cats, coffee, and manifesting good things into our lives. She even caught me having a tearful love at first pet moment with one of the precious cats at the cafe. Can't recommend it enough. If you go, stop by the counter and let Shannon pick out your coffee flavor! You won't regret it!
The people are so so nice here, it's a great environment and they have really good coffee!! The cats (of course) are so adorable. I could spend all day here

Housing these adoptable cats is lovely enough. Allowing folks to hang out with them is even better. On top of that, they offer food and beverages (the adult variety if you so choose)!  What's not to like? The space is obviously great for the kitties. Clean and well-decorated, full of toys to entertain the kitties and areas for them to comfortably lounge, it's a cool location. These cats are clearly well taken care of. I've been numerous times and the hour always flies by. There are many more trips in my future. Thank you, Mac Tabby, for what you do! If you like cats, book a reservation!

My favorite place to be! I have a membership and me and my boyfriend make it a date every Sunday.  Being able to be there so often is such a treat when you can work with the new kitties and help them out of their shell.  The staff is incredibly nice, and truly care about the well-being of the cats.  Drinks and great and the pastries are absolutely delicious.

Beautiful renovated space and beautiful kitties! Only one member of staff was on hand but she was very sweet and helpful. Didn't partake in the drinks so I can't give a review of their tastiness but this is such a great idea, experience, and good therapy for humans and cats alike! Please check it out!
Such a great place, with great staff, great prices, and adorable kitties  We can't wait to go back!

If you love cats and you only want to pet a cat this is the place for you. Very cozy in the cafe area good mochas and coffee drinks. And wonderful cats that are for adoption. A great place to relax for an hour.
Best local bar in charlotte. Pet cats and have a drink. Had a great time.

Exceeded our expectations! We participated in "Kitty Time" with our daughter who is one. Absolutely fantastic experience! Coffee was super yummy, and who doesn't love to pet cats while they sip. Everyone was warm and friendly. Highly recommend!

The place is so clean and neat, just the best atmosphere around. The staff are really nice too! The cat room is very clean as well, and the cats a bit shy at first but friendly. I can't recommend this place highly enough.
Amazing place. Cute and friendly cats that are all for adoption and really good coffee.
Great atmosphere, fun way to spend the afternoon.

My tea and cookie was so good. This was my first time coming here. It was so peaceful sitting with the beautiful cats. They are very well fed and groomed. I thoroughly enjoyed my time and will be coming back. I encourage everyone to visit and spend time with the cats.
This is a wonderful place to have coffee and relax . The cat lounge is great with different areas to sit and lots of toys. The cats and coffee are great :)
You can ship on your fave drink ... wine, beer, coffee or sugary drinks ... while you get love from the rescue cats. Best idea ever!
Awesome place to hang out with cats. Clean and friendly.

So so great!! Good coffee,  tea, even beers.  Def going back. You can adopt them too. Do an hour if you can, the time goes fast and you start getting comfortable with them at the half hour mark. Time flies!
Fun times playing with the cats & kittens! Great coffee and pleasant, knowledgeable staff!
This is not just a place for cat people but anyone that wants to relax and get away. They have a great selection of beverages from coffees to a great selection of craft beers.
Such a fun experience! The coffee was great and the staff is amazing. They really love on these sweet babies and the cats are so fun to interact with!
The most fun I've ever had in a coffee shop. Well worth the $24 for me and my wife to spend a hour with the kitties!
Wonderful experience. The owner is so nice and down to earth. Great beer selection. The kitties were adorable and very playful. Great atmosphere, will be back again soon!!
Great environment and friendly staff. Loved visiting the cats
Fun experience and they help rescues! Super clean

Absolutely awesome. I've wanted to go here since I moved here. And I absolutely had the time of my life. I'm pretty sure I'd live here if I could. Fiance could have a beer and I could hang with the kitties and that's all I need in my life for it to be complete. THANK YOU! YALL ARE THE BEST!

This place is so great to just chill and have a latte while playing with some sweet kitties. The drinks were delicious and it was nice for my daughter and I to get some relaxing time out of the house. We're even looking into adopting one of the precious kitties!

I went this morning for the first time with my 2 older kiddos.  The cafe is perfection with how they have it laid out and decorated.  The drinks and treats were delicious.  The cats, oh my gosh, the cats!!!  I felt like I was walking on air when I left, it was seriously so good for the soul to just spend an hour playing with all the sweet kitties.  I can't wait to go back! Both ladies working this morning were fantastic as well.
Amazing place its a must visit.
I had a great time with friends & the wonderful cats!  They were so sweet.  .  The facility is very peaceful & clean.  I definitely recommend this Cat Cafe in Concord!
Wonderful vibe, great coffee and drinks.  We had such a great time!
Very cute place! Loved all the kitty cats!
Love this place!
Was my second visit there. Great place and friendly staff. Great coffee choices, I had a iced coffee that was good. They had around 12 cats there. Easy to park. Will be back again.

A great place to come for some "pet therapy". The cats are friendly and playful. Nice large area for spending some purr-time. Staff is very nice and the smoothies are quite tasty! Love the old building this place is housed. The place feels cozy and inviting.
We absolutely loved it! Very cute and the coffee was great. The cat visitation is separated from the coffee bar. Everyone was very nice!

Great place to visit. Lots of cats/kittens. They serve coffees, lemonade, etc. Enjoyed visiting the felines but really expensive...but as long as the money is going towards the cats...I'm ok with it!?
So much fun!!! Love this location. Definitely prefer it to the NoDa location but both are amazing to experience the cats at!!

A nice quiet little Cafe with a bonus.  Small furry friends that will tolerate being in the same space as you.

For a little extra you can spend your time in the cat room interacting with the cats that are available for adoption if you end up falling in love with one.

Great selection of beverages in the Cafe, beautiful artwork featured throughout, and staff are friendly. Great outdoor patio and atmosphere too!

The cats are all available for adoption and are all from a local rescue.

They
Got a chai tea latte. Tasted great! The problem is, I ordered a large which is over $5 and the large is super small. It's a small cup being offered as a large for over $5. I Can't go back.

We absolutely loved visiting this cafe!   Parking was not an issue at all, and other cute local shops in walking distance.  Inside the cafe was so cute with cats (wallpaper, artwork, bathrooms were very clean). The staff was very friendly and my Vanilla Hazelnut iced coffee was so tasty.  All the cats were excited to see us and some just wanted to sleep. There were two kittens that loved playing with the toys!  We will definitely go back if we're in the area again!
My daughter and I went in as walk in guests and got to spend some time with the precious kitties. We had so much fun! What a great concept for a cafe
Absolutely enjoyable experience!!! Staff was super inviting! Super clean environment and great drinks! We will be coming back!
The cutest! I have mega allergies to cats but this is the only way my daughter gets to see cats. Sweet staff. Good coffee. Indoor and outdoor seating. We went on opening day and will be back!

I really enjoyed my visit at Mac Tabby Cat Cafe in Concord, NC.  The location is great with easy access to parking.  The front porch gives the cafe a quaint appearance and is a great place to hang out while visiting.  The cafe has some beautiful paintings of cats and has a large selection of beverages.  The staff was very courteous and the cats were fun to play with.  I highly recommend paying them a visit if you are in the area.

My family and I spent an hour today at Mac Tabby and it couldn't have been more purrrfect!! The atmosphere is soothing, the  cats were so entertaining  and Katie E.  was the best! She made sure all of of our orders were filled with a pleasant attitude and a beautiful smile on her face! We will definitely go back! We love Mac Tabby!

This place is welcoming and gorgeously decorated. I will absolutely be going back. The peanut butter banana smoothie was so so good. I brought my kids and they are ages 2 & 5, definitely have one adult per kid if you visit and make sure they are ok with you and the ages of your kids. The rules are age 7+ and I think that is a good idea as the cats need to have safe rules in place so they are safe. The set up of maximizing this quaint building is done very well. There is a good bit of spaced out seating for groups of 2-4, ~5 parties of that or so. I am excited for drinks from southern strain brewery from Concord and other small businesses to be at this establishment for a relaxing night out. The front porch is a great place to relax in the shade outside. You enter the building through the side of the building. You get to the front porch by the outside gate. I hope all the cats here find wonderful homes! Cheers to opening a second location!! @kieraandtheboys

I've been to the NoDa location but today was my first visit to the Mac Tabby Concord location...and I will definitely be back. The ambience is unique and cozy, and their roomy front porch is perfect for reading, writing, and enjoying one of their scrumptious drinks.The cats are healthy, happy, and absolutely adorable. If I didn't already have two dogs, I would be the proud owner of a new cat (or three)!!

Mac Tabby is close to two parking decks, but there is also limited parking spots across the road. If you have other shopping to do, they are located conveniently to Union Street and all of its fabulous shops.

We had so much fun today!  I took my granddaughter and it was a great time. We got to play with frisky cats and rub slumbering cats. We even had a cat come sit by us and chill.
Nice staff, beautiful space, and great tribe of cats!
